availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Sebree (Owen County laborer and inmate)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, laborer and inmate. Kentucky native. Married to Lucy Sebree. Incarcerated for murder in the Kentucky State Penitentiary in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 287.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, Caney, p. 127B.
